sentences: Kui nad jõuavad, me oleme juba kohal.
context: The word 'jõuame' is the 1st person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'jõudma', which means 'to arrive', 'to reach', or 'to get somewhere'. It indicates that a group of people (including the speaker) will arrive at or reach a destination in the present or near future.
